borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p>The proposed development will abut the boundary with No. 41 Saint Awdry's Road, extending 8.575 metres beyond the neighbouring rear window. This results in an unacceptable impacts on the living conditions of this neighbour in relation to the sense of overbearing and enclosure, overshadowing and the loss of daylight and outlook as a consequence. The development is contrary to:</p><p>- National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019) <br>- Policies 7.1, 7.4, and 7.6 of The London Plan (March 2016)<br>- Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Borough Wide DPD (March 2011)<br>- Policies DMD1 and DMD6 of the Draft Local Plan (Regulation 19 Consultation version, October 2020).<br>- Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD (February 2012)</p>
description: Construction of single storey rear and side infill extension and part demolition of the rear outbuilding.
